verses.arabic: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.english: By Mount Ṭûr!<sup foot_note=77430>1</sup>

verses.arabic: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.english: And by the Book written

verses.arabic: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.english: on open pages ˹for all to read˺!<sup foot_note=77431>1</sup>

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
verses.english: And by the ˹Sacred˺ House frequently visited!<sup foot_note=77432>1</sup>

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.english: And by the canopy raised ˹high˺!

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
verses.english: And by the seas set on fire!<sup foot_note=77433>1</sup>

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.english: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will come to pass—

verses.arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.english: none will avert it—

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
verses.english: on the Day the heavens will be shaken violently,

verses.arabic: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.english: and the mountains will be blown away entirely.

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.english: Then woe on that Day to the deniers—

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.english: those who amuse themselves with falsehood!

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.english: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be fiercely shoved into the Fire of Hell.

verses.arabic: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.english: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Fire which you used to deny.

verses.arabic: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.english: Is this magic, or do you not see?

verses.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: Burn in it! It is the same whether you endure ˹it˺ patiently or not.<sup foot_note=77434>1</sup> You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be in Gardens and bliss,

verses.arabic: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.english: enjoying whatever their Lord will have granted them. And their Lord will have protected them from the torment of the Hellfire.

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.english: They will be reclining on thrones, ˹neatly˺ lined up ˹facing each other˺. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.english: As for those who believe and whose descendants follow them in faith, We will elevate their descendants to their rank, never discounting anything ˹of the reward˺ of their deeds. Every person will reap only what they sowed.<sup foot_note=77435>1</sup>

verses.arabic: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.english: And We will ˹continually˺ provide them with whatever fruit or meat they desire.

verses.arabic: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.english: They will pass around to each other a drink ˹of pure wine,˺ which leads to no idle talk or sinfulness.

verses.arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.english: And they will be waited on by their youthful servants like spotless pearls.

verses.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.english: They will turn to one another inquisitively.<sup foot_note=77436>1</sup>

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.english: They will say, “Before ˹this reward˺ we used to be in awe ˹of Allah˺ in the midst of our people.

verses.arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.english: So Allah has graced us and protected us from the torment of ˹Hell’s˺ scorching heat.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.english: Indeed, we used to call upon Him ˹alone˺ before. He is truly the Most Kind, Most Merciful.”

verses.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.english: So ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺. For you, by the grace of your Lord, are not a fortune-teller or a madman.

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
verses.english: Or do they say, “˹He is˺ a poet, for whom we ˹eagerly˺ await an ill-fate!”?

verses.arabic: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.english: Say, “Keep waiting! I too am waiting with you.”

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.english: Or do their ˹intelligent˺ minds prompt them to this ˹paradox˺?<sup foot_note=77437>1</sup> Or are they ˹just˺ a transgressing people?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Or do they say, “He made this ˹Quran˺ up!”? In fact, they have no faith.

verses.arabic: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: Let them then produce something like it, if what they say is true!<sup foot_note=77438>1</sup>

verses.arabic: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.english: Or were they created by nothing, or are they ˹their own˺ creators?

verses.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.english: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they have no firm belief ˹in Allah˺.

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
verses.english: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord, or are they in control ˹of everything˺?

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Or do they have a stairway, by which they eavesdrop ˹on the heavens˺? Then let those who do so bring a compelling proof.

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.english: Or does He have daughters ˹as you claim˺, while you ˹prefer to˺ have sons?<sup foot_note=77439>1</sup>

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.english: Or are you ˹O Prophet˺ asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.english: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.english: Or do they intend to scheme ˹against the Prophet˺? Then it is the disbelievers who will fall victim to ˹their˺ schemes.

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glorified is Allah far above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

verses.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.english: If they were to see a ˹deadly˺ piece of the sky fall down ˹upon them˺, still they would say, “˹This is just˺ a pile of clouds.”

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.english: So leave them until they face their Day in which they will be struck dead—

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.english: the Day their scheming will be of no benefit to them whatsoever, nor will they be helped.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Also, the wrongdoers will certainly have another torment before that ˹Day˺, but most of them do not know.<sup foot_note=77440>1</sup>

verses.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.english: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, for you are truly under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes. And glorify the praises of your Lord when you rise.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.english: And glorify Him during part of the night and at the fading of the stars.
